crimeSpy.crimeData

Class CrimeCollectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • crimeSpy.crimeData.CrimeCollectionManager

  • public class CrimeCollectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages collections of crimes (CrimeCollection object) Will provide search and filter functionality. Will provide the ability to merge or split collections. Will keep track of all caseId's seen across all CrimeCollections for super user validation. At this stage we are not concerned if two separatecrime collections have the same caseId.

      • mergeCollections

        public CrimeCollection mergeCollections(CrimeCollection cC1,
                                        CrimeCollection cC2)
        Creates a new CrimeCollection that is the result of merging two CrimeCollections cC1 and cC2. The new CrimeCollection will have duplicate error checks
        Parameters:
        cC1 - CrimeCollection 1 to be merged
        cC2 - CrimeCollection 2 to be merged
        Returns:
        CrimeCollection (of merged collections)
